name: chrome-devtools
title: Chrome Devtools
description: A Raycast extension that fetches and displays Chromeâ€™s console logs and network requests in real time, enabling quick debugging and insights without leaving Raycast.
author: ikaushiksharma

commands.name: consoles
commands.title: Consoles
commands.subtitle: Chrome Devtools
commands.description: View and monitor Chrome's console logs in real-time, including errors, warnings, and debug messages.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
